# Test that check command aliases work

muxt generate

muxt check
! stderr .

muxt c
! stderr .

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed *.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "*.gohtml"))
-- index.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <h1>Test</h1>
</body>
</html>
{{end}}
